TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Grid extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Grid Inherits Panel Implements IAddChild
public ref class Grid : System::Windows::Controls::Panel, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 定义由列和行组成的灵活的网格区域。

span.span: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含一套对象，后者是在属性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 在中定义的行和列可以充分利用调整大小以按比例分配剩余的空间。Columns and rows that are defined within a can take advantage of sizing to distribute remaining space proportionally. 当被选为的高度或宽度的行或列，列或行接收剩余的可用空间的加权的比例。When is selected as the height or width of a row or column, that column or row receives a weighted proportion of the remaining available space. 这是与此相反，这样可以将均匀地基于行或列中的内容的大小的空间。This is in contrast to , which distributes space evenly based on the size of the content that is within a column or row. 此值表示为`*`或`2*`当你使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This value is expressed as `*` or `2*` when you use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 在第一种情况下，行或列将得到一倍的可用空间，在第二种情况下，行或列会得到两次的可用空间，等等。In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space, while in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on. 通过将此项可按比例分配空间的技术结合起来和值`Stretch`，可以按百分比的屏幕空间的分区布局空间。By combining this technique to proportionally distribute space with a and value of `Stretch`, it is possible to partition layout space by percentage of screen space. 是唯一的布局面板可以分发以这种方式的空间。 is the only layout panel that can distribute space in this manner. 默认情况下，行和列占用最少的空间容纳给定的行或列中所含任意单元格中的最大内容所需。By default, rows and columns take up the least amount of space necessary to accommodate the largest content within any cell contained in a given row or column. 例如，如果某一列具有长的单词开头的一个单元格"hippopotamus"包含在它，但所有其他单元格的列中没有"dog"等的较小单词，则列的宽度将最大 word (hippopotamus) 的宽度。For example, if a column has one cell with a long word like "hippopotamus" contained within it but all the other cells in the column have smaller words like "dog", the width of the column will be the width of the largest word (hippopotamus). 您可以精确地定位子元素的的结合使用属性和对齐方式属性。You can precisely position child elements of a by using a combination of the property and alignment properties. 子元素的绘制在标记或代码中出现的顺序。Child elements of a are drawn in the order in which they appear in markup or code. 因此，当元素共享相同的坐标时，可以实现分层的顺序 （也称为 z 顺序）。As a consequence, layered order (also known as z-order) can be achieved when elements share the same coordinates. 和共享一些常见的功能，但它们也可以应用于相应方案以便更好地使用它的内置功能。 and share some common functionality, but each can be applied in appropriate scenarios to better use its built-in features. 添加基于在行和列的索引; 上的元素却没有。 adds elements based on a row and column index; does not. 元素允许分层的内容，其中可以在单个单元格中存在多个元素。The element allows layering of content, where more than one element can exist within a single cell. 不支持分层。 does not support layering. 子元素的进行绝对定位相对于其"单元格"边界的左上角。Child elements of a can be absolutely positioned relative to the upper-left corner of their "cell" boundaries. 不支持此功能。 does not support this feature. 也提供了更灵活地调整大小行为比。 also offers more flexible resizing behavior than . 使用对象来定义的大小调整特征或。 uses the object to define the sizing characteristics of a or . 有关每个单元类型的定义，请参阅。For a definition of each unit type, see . 如果将子元素添加到内的列，并且列没有其属性设置为`Auto`，子将测量不受限制。If a child element is added to a column within a , and the column has its property set to `Auto`, the child will be measured without restrictions. 此行为可以防止水平滚动条显示如果正在使用，测量子元素为不受限制。This behavior can prevent horizontal scroll bars from displaying if a is being used, as the child element is measured as unbounded. 出于显示目的，子剪辑而滚动。For purposes of display, the child is clipped rather than scrolled. 默认情况下，面板元素不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制要接收焦点的面板元素，将设置属性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建网格时。The following example demonstrates how to create a grid. 在这种情况下，网格定义三个元素和第四个承载子内容的元素。In this case, the grid defines three elements and four elements that host child content. [!code-csharp[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/CSharp/Grid_Code.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/VisualBasic/grid_vb.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/XAML/default.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 中的网格线是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grid lines are visible within this .

value.span: 如果网格线可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if grid lines are visible; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用网格线创建中的所有元素周围的虚线。Enabling grid lines creates dotted lines around all the elements within a . 仅用点线是可用的因为此属性并为设计工具用于调试布局问题并且不应在生产质量代码中使用。Only dotted lines are available because this property is intended as a design tool to debug layout problems and is not intended for use in production quality code. 如果你想在行中的元素的样式为具有边框。If you want lines inside a , style the elements within the to have borders. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
